## 🎯 Scope
Features, components, or flows covered.

## 🛂 Entry criteria
Code complete? Env ready?

## 🏁 Exit criteria
All P1 bugs fixed, pass rate ≥ X %.

## 🧰 Test environments & tools
Staging URL, devices, data sets.

## 📜 Test suites / cases
Link or list Test Cases (\#…).

## 🗓  Schedule
Target dates, responsible testers.
